document.full_text: with just 71 babies born on average for every 100 deaths, brooke county, in west virginia, has the largest such gap in the nation among counties in metropolitan areas.
document.title: with death outpacing birth, a county slows to a shuffle
lines_and_colors: with just 71 babies born on average for every 100 deaths, brooke county, in west virginia, has the largest such gap in the nation among counties in metropolitan areas.
